question: The Ministry of Women and Child Development has recently launched an online portal “NARI”. Which of the following statements is correct about the “NARI” portal?
option1: It aims to provide women citizens with easy access to information on government schemes.
option2: It aims for the holistic development of adolescent girls
option3: It aims to provide primary shelter, food, clothing and care to the marginalized women
option4: It aims to provide skills and build competency that would help to provide employment to women
answer: It aims to provide women citizens with easy access to information on government schemes.
explanation: Ministry of Women and Child Development has recently launched an online portal called “NARI”. The portal aims to provide women citizens with easy access to information on government schemes and initiatives for women. It also aims to provide a platform for NGOs and Civil Societies to interact with the Ministry of Women & Child Development.
